comments:
Received an internal error when opening up a JSP editor on a file using last week's 2.0.1 I-build. I receive the first stack trace below when I first open the file. If I close and reopen, I get the second stack trace below.

This wasn't happening when I was using the same build and workspace yesterday, but now I get it every time. I'll try re-unzipping, but I have no reason to suspect that the folder is corrupt.
